title: Chi Asian Bistro
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A northern Chinese noodle house with some vegetarian items that are clearly marked on menu; vegan to specify. Staff is accommodating. Noodles made fresh every day, with dishes cooked to order using local and organic ingredients where possible. Organic, low-sulphite wine list, extensive organic tea list, Chinese beer, and Japanese sake. Previously named Da Tang Noodle House, Nov 2013.
